Overland_Park.Naka-Kon:
Naka-Kon is an annual three-day anime convention held during March at the Overland Park Convention Center in Overland Park, Kansas; a suburb of Kansas City.


== Programming ==
The convention typically offers a Artist Alley, contests, Dealers’ Room, game shows, fashion show, maid cafe, panels, showings, video game rooms, and workshops.


== History ==
Naka-Kon was founded in 2005 by members of the University of Kansas Anime Club.
